page.title: 19Summary
page.content:
This is a summary of the last few pages in English.LANGUAGE.Over 90% of the population speak Welsh.EDUCATION- There are five primary schools at Caernarfon(3 to 11 year old) and one secondary school(12to18year old.) There is one special school for the Educationally Sub Normal.EMPLOYMENT A large percentage of the working population is unemployed.RELIGION There are 8 chapels and 4 churches in Caernarfon.ATTITUDES of Dafydd Wigley M.P. and The Town Mayor.They both liked the people of the town both thought that there is far too much litter in the town.Eirian Hughes age 11 thought the castle is the most important building in Caernarfon . We have not discussed Anglesey because
because
